product_name: Black Diamond Post-Op Touring Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Long stints of stop-and-go are the hallmark of cold-weather mountain travel, so the Post-Op Touring pants are built to handle the dynamic demands of skiing and winter climbing.
short_description: Long stints of stop-and-go are the hallmark of cold-weather mountain travel, so the Post-Op Touring pants are built to handle the dynamic demands of skiing and winter climbing.
